title: Having Issues downloading a specific replay
body:
So, yesterday I played a game that I did really well with Caitlyn, and I wanted to download the replay today. I go and click the button for the replay, and it says an error occurred, please try again. I clicked the "download replay" for the games before and after that game, and they both were fine, and they were played right before and right after the game I wanted the replay for.

I would really love to get the replay for this match, because it was my first Penta on Cait and I felt that I did really well in it, but moreover I wanted to see what made me do so well that game; If I was just outplaying them, or if maybe they were doing something that allowed me to get out of hand. Either way, I really want this replay, no matter what I have to do to get it.

replies.body: There's a chance that replay was never saved correctly after the game ended, but we might still be able to get that replay downloaded. I'd like to be able to see what exact error is showing, so could you try grabbing that replay again and taking a screenshot of the error with something like Gyazo. Paste it here for me to see and we can go from there!

Unfortunately, I have to hover over the button to get the error, so I can't really send a screenshot of it. But it says exactly this:

"There was an error with your download. Click here to try again"

Image Link : https://gyazo.com/8eb06a0bde2284a3077d6fa0dbe6cf79
Thats just to show that the above and below games are just fine being downloaded, its just THIS specific one that won't download.

If it helps, I went ahead and gathered the client log right after I clicked the button to retrieve the replay, here's the link to the file:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BzFk2kdqG8bTLVdyTG5Ed2hUbHM/view?usp=sharing

It's possible that specific game hasn't been uploaded yet, even though it's a little odd that the one before and after are already available to download. Give it couple days if you can, and see if it will let you download in case it's just not on the servers yet. 

I noticed that you might have been playing with friends in that match, so I may have a little workaround if you still can't get it downloaded. You might be able to get one of those teammates to download and send the replay to you if you have any of them on your friends list!

So I did what you said and asked my friend to download it. He said he has the same issue and message. He went to download it and it wouldn't let him. Yet, he could download the ones above and below it.

Is there any way for me to get this replay at all? Cause as of now, this match isn't even on my match history and I REALLY want it, and by the time my friend might be able to download it he'll prob no longer have it in his match history as well.

If your friend wasn't able to download that match either, it probably didn't upload to the servers correctly. In that case, we're not going to have a way to get that replay since it was never saved correctly =(.
